message.name: ERR_HEARING_TRANSCRIBER_FV_PARTICIPANTROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The participant already exists for this hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_TRANSCRIBER_FV_CANNOT_CANCEL
message.locale: The request cannot be canceled as the transcript has been sent to the requester.
The request cannot be cancelled as the transcript has been sent to the requester.

message.name: INF_HEARING_TRANSCRIBER_FV_TRANSCRIPT_REQUESTED
message.locale: A hearing transcript has been requested.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_TRANSCRIBER_FV_TRANSCRIPT_REQUEST_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This request has been canceled and cannot be modified.
This request has been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_TRANSCRIBER_FV_TRANSCRIPT_REQUESTER_NOT_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: The requester is not a participant on this appeal case.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_TRANSCRIBER_FV_MULTIPLEREQUESTINVALID
message.locale: The requester has already requested a transcript of this hearing.

message.name: ERR_HEARING_TRANSCRIBER_FV_DUE_DATE_REQUIRED
message.locale: A due date must be provided, as this hearing has already been held.
